relevant_findings.ECG_changes: Marked ST depression in the inferolateral leads
relevant_findings.arrhythmias: Ventricular and supraventricular tachyarrhythmias; frequent multifocal premature ventricular contractions; runs of ventricular tachycardia

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved within minutes after administration of sublingual nitroglycerin; ECG abnormalities completely disappeared in less than 1 hour.
